title: Marginal benefit, maximum consumer willing to pay

content.prompt: The marginal benefit of consuming a good is

choices.label: the change in average utility that results from consuming one more unit of the good
the same as the total benefit
equal to the marginal cost of the good
the change in total expenditures as a result of buying one more unit of the good
the maximum amount a consumer is willing to pay for one more unit of the good

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe economic concepts, principles, or models.
